name: ai-terminal-serverless
description: AI Terminal Serverless Deployment for Aliyun Function Compute

scripts.build:frontend: cd ../terminal-ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prepare:code: rm -rf code/terminal-backend code/static && mkdir -p code/terminal-backend code/static
scripts.copy:data: mkdir -p code/terminal-backend/data && cp -r ../terminal-backend/data/* code/terminal-backend/data/ && cp -r ../terminal-backend/src/data/* code/terminal-backend/data/
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run prepare:code && npm run copy:frontend && npm run copy:backend && npm run copy:data
